turns.text: Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment. turns.text: Right now, Save the Children remains gravely concerned about the well-being of children in the custody of the U.S. government after crossing our southern border. We know from our nearly 100 years of service that family separation and detention can cause severe, long-lasting trauma, which ultimately results in the loss of childhood.
